about_the_game:
If you already own King’s Quest(TM): The Complete Collection or Season Pass, DO NOT repurchase this content here or you will be charged again. Please download new chapters from within the game. King’s Quest - Chapter 1: A Knight to Remember is required to play this content and is available to download and play for free.

In his latest adventure, King Graham tells of his final battle with the Goblin Sorcerer Manannan and his final adventure.
detailed_description:
If you already own King’s Quest(TM): The Complete Collection or Season Pass, DO NOT repurchase this content here or you will be charged again. Please download new chapters from within the game. King’s Quest - Chapter 1: A Knight to Remember is required to play this content and is available to download and play for free.

In his latest adventure, King Graham tells of his final battle with the Goblin Sorcerer Manannan and his final adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6300 @ 1.86 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 4800+ @ 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 4770 / 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 CPU 530 @ 2.93GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 4770 / 512 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
